name: My brain when I feel bad.
name_original: My brain when I feel bad.
description:
I feel bad.
This is my brain
Try to cheer me up. It may not be easy.

If you want to sugest a new sentence, send it to me @grifdail and I'll be happy to make up an answer.

Beware, this interactive thing may not have any good ending or moral. It's not a nice game about depression. You should probably not use it if you feel depressed. It's only meant as a way to share a tiny slice of how I feel.
